document.full_text: nbc universal said on thursday veteran sports programing executive dick ebersol has resigned from the company after a 40-year career at nbc spanning the olympics and "sunday night football" to "saturday night live."
document.title: nbc sports chief ebersol resigns
lines_and_colors: nbc universal said on thursday veteran sports programing executive dick ebersol has resigned from the company after a 40-year career at nbc spanning the olympics and "sunday night football" to "saturday night live."
